briefTitle: Epigenetics and Psychoneurologic Symptoms in Women With Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Epigenetic Factors Associated With Symptoms and Complications of Chronic Disorders
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Epigenetics and psychoneurologic symptoms in women receiving chemotherapy for breast cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* At least 21 years of age
* Diagnosed with stage I to IIIa Breast Cancer
* Scheduled to receive chemotherapy

Exclusion Criteria:

* previous cancer history
* previous chemotherapy history
* dementia
* active psychosis
